game.name: DRFT
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: DRFT a silly, whacky drifting roguelike where you control a car that should not be controlled! Bouncing from walls, maintaining control all while frantically shooting at chasing enemies! Upgrade over-the-top weapons that wreck havoc to anything in their path and go even crazier when you drift around
